descriptionHtml:
This is ONLY translation of mod Dovahkiins Journal (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=18210)

Description:
Adds to Players inventory Book (Journal) that tracks and displays Players and his/hers Followers (if applicable) stats.
Journal automatically updates every 3 in-game hours (~9 real life minutes) and can be force updated by dropping on the ground or transferring to a container and back to inventory.

Version History:
1.0 - Initial release.
1.01 - Fixed typo in the name (pointed out by dimoskif)

p.s. I would welcome any feedback/suggestions on improving the mod (naming, appearance, content, layout, etc).
author: 7-zete-7
